title: The marked price of a TV is Rs 18,500. A dealer allows two successive discounts of 20% and 5%. For how much is the TV available? - Quora

response.answer_text: Given tv price = 18500 Two discount 1)20% 2)5 % Lets find the first discounted price of a tv Tv price = 18500 Discount = 20% of 18500 Calculation = 20/100× 18500 Sum of discount price = 3700 Hence the actual price after deducting the 1st discount amount = 18500–3700 Sum of total 1st discounted price Of a tv = Rs.14800. Calculation of 2nd discount price Tv price of discounted amount = 14800 2nd discount rate 5% of 14800 Calculation = 5/100×14800 We get the final discount amount of the tv= 740. Now to get the final price of the tv We subract the 2nd discount amount with The 1st final disounted amount of the tv Calculation of final amt = 14800–740 We get = Rs. 14060.
